abstract: Tod Leiweke becomes chief operating officer of NFL.
lead_paragraph: The league appointed Tod Leiweke as its new chief operating officer, a position that has been vacant since Commissioner Roger Goodell was promoted to the league’s top spot.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; N.H.L. Executive Hired

snippet: The league appointed Tod Leiweke as its new chief operating officer, a position that has been vacant since Commissioner Roger Goodell was promoted to the league’s top spot.
